summary: An .esp that modify many skills of the game to bring a more balanced game in term of dificulty.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s29.postimg.org/veoyfpr3r/Dont_Feel_Powerful_Transparent.png[/img][/center]

[b][color=orange]First at all, I'm not an english speaker so I'm sorry if you don't understand something.[/color][/b]

Don't Feel Powerful (DFP from now) aims to balance the power that the perks give to you as you progress in the game and increase levels.

I hope not be the one that feel that the high level game is broken, because the cumulative amount of percentage of skills improvements break the feeling of Skyrim is a dangerous place.

That is why I've had this mod.

[b][color=orange]Then What does the mod?[/color][/b]

This mod rebalances the amount of percentage that the perks gives us. The changes are the next:

- [b][color=green]Combat Style Skills[/color][/b] and Perks like one-handed, two-handed and Archery change the values of the main Perk from 20% until 100% to 10% at first perk to 50% with 5 accumulations.

- [b][color=green]Magic:[/color][/b] Aiming to improve the powerless Vanilla Magic DFP make some changes to 3 magic schools: Destruction, Conjuration and Restoration. Destruction and Restoration improve the damage and effectiveness of spells by 50% and Conjuration improves the spells duration by 100%.

- The other Perks that not involved directly in combat like Pickpocketing, Stealth, Alchemy or Enchantment are too reduced to 10%-50% min. and max. main Perk values.

- in addition, [b][color=green]Alchemy and Enchantment[/color][/b] have been seriously decreased. The Perks that improve potions, poisons and skills and elements enchantments have been reduced from 25% to 10% of improvement.

- [b][color=green]Armor Perks[/color][/b] (Light and Heavy) have reduced too until 50% max. values and the specific bonus set perks to 10%.

- In relation to [b][color=green]Smithing[/color][/b], the feature of double improve weapons and armors have been removed, so the Smithing perks only let you craft the consequent racial or material style of weapons and armors.

[b][color=orange]Installation and Requirements:[/color][/b]

- It contains two simples .esp mods separated so you can install it with NMM or Unzip in your Data Folder of Skyrim Installation Directory.

- This mod is a simple modification of the Skyrim.esm Perks so you don't need anything extra.

[b][color=orange]Compatibility:[/color][/b]

- DFP modifies the original perks values and other mods that modify this parameters shouldn't works together. I don't know if other perks and skills mods that modify, for example, perk points or experience modifications works with this mod.

[b][color=orange]Thanks:[/color][/b]

- I don't know if this work already exists, I haven't looked other people's works, just nosing around the CK in the perks menu I saw these options and the idea came to me. Anyway, my thanks to everybody that like my mod and I hope nobody sense I'm trampling his/her work, thanks again.
